script.name: Manual Student Scheduling: CSV Export Enrollments
script.description:
Export student class enrollments of a course into a CSV file

Format:
  • There is a line for each student
  • PUID, Name, CRN1, CRN2, ....
Parameters:
  • Course: students of this course offering will be exported
  • Add Leading Zeros: add leading zeros to the PUID
  • All Enrollments: include enrollments of other courses (checked) or just the entered course (unchecked)
  • Drop Students: whether to drop the students from the course

script.name: Manual Student Scheduling: CSV File Enroll
script.description:
Used the provided CSV file to enroll students on the online student scheduling server.

For each student that is included in the file, the appropriate Enroll action is created and executed on the online student scheduling server.
Input is expected in the following CSV format:
  • There is a line for each student class enrollment
  • PUID, Name, CRN1, CRN2, CRN3, ...
Output is returned in the following CSV format:
  • There is a line for each student class enrollment
  • PUID, Name, Course, CRN, Result, Error Message
Parameters:
  • Class Enrollments: input file in the above format
  • Clear Existing Enrollments: when true student enrollments are reset to what is in the file, otherwise the existing enrollments are extended with the enrollments in the file
  • Name Columns: number of columns with student name
  • Trim Leading Zeros: trim leading zeros from the PUID

script.name: Manual Student Scheduling: CSV File Enroll [XE]
script.description:
Use the provided CSV file to enroll students via the Banner XE API.

Input is expected in the CSV format.
There is a line for each student class enrollment:
PUID, Name, CRN1, CRN2, CRN3, ...

Output is returned in the CSV format.
There is a line for each student class enrollment:
PUID, Name, Course, CRN, Request, Registration Status, Error Message, Used Override

Parameters:

  • Class Enrollments: input file in the above format
  • Name Columns: number of columns with student name
  • Automatic Overrides: check to use automatic overrides
  • Allowed Overrides: list of overrides that can be used (when enabled)
  • Manual Overrides: list of overrides that are manually put in
  • Conditional Add Drop: check if conditional add drop is to be enabled
  • Hold Password: enter hold password if students with hold should be enrolled
  • Registration Date: for back-dating enter registration date (in yyyy-mm-dd format)

script.name: Manual Student Scheduling: CSV File DROP [XE]
script.description:
Use the provided CSV file to DROP students via the Banner XE API.

Input is expected in the CSV format.
There is a line for each student:
PUID, Name, CRN1, CRN2, CRN3, ...

Output is returned in the CSV format.
There is a line for each student drop:
PUID, Name, Course, CRN, Registration Status, Error Message

Parameters:

  • Student Drop File: input file in the above format
  • Name Columns: number of columns with student name
  • Mode: student will be dropped from all his/her classes when set to Drop All CRNs
  • Conditional Add Drop: check if conditional add drop is to be enabled
  • Hold Password: enter hold password if students with hold should be enrolled
  • Registration Date: for back-dating enter registration date (in yyyy-mm-dd format)
